Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

allFilledProperties(default,null) : Int

bit-flag with the filled properties of this style-object and it's extended, super, inherited and parent style.

filledProperties(default,null) : Int

Variable defining which properties in the style-declaration have been set or not according to the flags of the style-declaration.

invalidated(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal2<Int, IInvalidatable>

inherited from prime.core.traits.IInvalidatable
List with IInvalidatables that want to be notified when values in this instance changes

updateAllFilledPropertiesFlag() : Void

Method which will update the flags in allFilledProperties when it's style or that of its extended, super, inherited and parent style changes.
